name: Roller Coaster Egypt VR
description: Roller Coaster Egypt VR more than five minutes, with lots of excitement and speed. Enjoy the ride between pyramids, mummies and even spiders! Two rides included, day and night. Enjoy the night ride and have fun!
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7, Win 8, Win 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or AMD R9 290 equivalent Storage: 512 MB available space
